en.welcome: Welcome to RLG Data & RLG Fans!
en.pricing_note: Pricing will be shown after registration based on your region.
en.locked_pricing_notice: You cannot change your region after registration.
en.compliance_notice: We comply with all regional regulations and pricing rules.

sw.welcome: Karibu RLG Data na RLG Fans!
